creator: pkuzel@netbeans.com
text:
The issue was discussed at mailing list but nobody performed the change:
creating new product for Xerces2.

creator: twleung@sauria.com
text: I only saw one +1 vote -- from me.

creator: lehors@apache.org
text:
Is creating a new product necessary? It seems that all we need really is to 
have a version number such as 2.0alpha. The only pb with this is that we can't 
use 'cvs extract' for Xerces2... So maybe creating a new product is the right 
thing after all.
I'll go either way but I agree with Peter that we need to do something about it.
Let's call for a new vote then.
creator: twleung@sauria.com
